Package aco

Class Pheromones

java.lang.Object
aco.Pheromones
public class Pheromones extends Object
The Pheromones class represents the pheromone levels on edges in the graph. It allows adding and retrieving the pheromone levels for specific edges.

    • addPheromone

      public void addPheromone(Edge edge, double add_pheromones)
      Adds pheromones to the specified edge by updating its pheromone level.
      Parameters:
      edge - The edge to which pheromones should be added.
      add_pheromones - The amount of pheromones to add to the edge.

    • setPheromone

      public void setPheromone(Edge edge, double pheromoneLevel)
      Sets the pheromone level of the specified edge.
      Parameters:
      edge - The edge for which to set the pheromone level.
      pheromoneLevel - The new pheromone level for the edge.
